metadata.name: Index::List
metadata.description: Index::List is a special case Array with additional values.

metadata.name: token
metadata.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

metadata.name: token=
metadata.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

metadata.name: initialize
metadata.description: Create a new Index::List with an array of Index instances.

metadata.name: next?
metadata.description: Whether there a next page of indexes.

metadata.name: all
metadata.description: Retrieves all indexes by repeatedly loading pages until #next? returns false. Returns the list instance for method chaining.

metadata.name: ensure_connection!
metadata.description: Raise an error unless an active connection is available.
